channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BYD overtakes Tesla as world's top seller of EVs — and the gap is big
Dow up over 300 points as first trading day of 2026 winds down — follow live
Trump says U.S. will intervene if Iran 'violently kills' protestors
item.description: Protests erupted last week over the government's handling of a sharp fall in the nation's currency and soaring prices.

item.title: Ilya Lichtenstein, Bitcoin hacker behind massive crypto theft, credits Trump for early prison release
item.description: Ilya Lichtenstein had been sentenced to five years in prison after pleading guilty and admitting to the hack of crypto assets valued in the billions o...

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ finale was a $30 million Netflix gift to cinema owners

New York Mayor Mamdani vows to enact democratic socialist agenda
item.description: Zohran Mamdani was sworn in as New York City mayor in the first minutes of the New Year at the historic City Hall subway station.

item.title: Italy says U.S. sharply reduced proposed pasta tariffs after a review
